name: Jumpman Adventures
description:
This is the epic and cool adventures of Jumpman.

You have to jump on platforms to progress through cool levels.

I hope nothing bad like a coruption is gonna happen again.

Note: if the game suddenly quits after finishing a level, just run it again. It should be fine :)

Controls:

A = Left

D = Right

Space = Jump

Programmer:

Emil Hansen

Artists:

Hanna Jeanette Bjørkhaug

Martine S. Pearson
